actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to establish within the Department of State an Assistant Secretary for Claims Against Foreign Ministers and Diplomats; to award just compensation for such claims.

summary.text: Requires full and just compensation by the United States for any person or property injured by any ambassador, public minister, or servant of such minister who has diplomatic immunity. Establishes an Assistant Secretary for Claims Against Foreign Ministers and Diplomats within the Department of State who shall award such compensation.

titles.title: A bill to establish within the Department of State an Assistant Secretary for Claims Against Foreign Ministers and Diplomats; to award just compensation for such claims.
